name: Area ready and accessible for work - take picture of all
Location Correct As per Plan/Drawing - Record Drawing Number
All insulation joints glued - test and photograph
Drain roughin - Pressure Pipe - Green Glue
Traps on FCU and Safety Tray installed (if required)
Correct Fan Coil Installed - Record Serial Number
Seismic mounts installed as per drawing (M12 Rod with Hilti HSC-I Anchors into concrete)
R/A Plenum with filters installed (Check filter access both sides)
Anti Vibration mounts fitted to FCU and R/A plenum
R/A and S/A hard connections (not canvas)
Drain roughin from FCU to tundish point - horizontal runs insulated
Duct work installed with clearance from other services
Duct work adequately supported with anti vibration mounts (where required)
Flex installed and adequately supported (with Gutterguard)
Fan coil and condenser terminations complete
Electrical supply roughed in (dektites for roof penetration)
Isolator installed adjacent to condenser and Sealed
Penetration through roof sealed and turned down
Correct Condenser installed - Record Serial Number
Condenser mounts installed - Rubber Feet and loose bolted to suit seismic requirements
System pressure tested for 24 hours - 3500 KPA
Additional refrigerant charge - Record amount + Write on indide of condenser service panel
System test run on Cooling cycle and Heating cycle (minimum 2 hours each)
Handover - Work completed as per specification, checked and accepted
Area ready and accessible for work - take picture of all
Correct Fan Installed - Record Serial Number
Dropper installed in shaft and sealed to underflashing
Fan sealed to duct with foam tape
Fan secured to duct with a minimum of 4 screws
Duct work installed with clearance from other services
Flex installed and adequately supported (with Gutterguard)
Equipment Isolator - installed and correctly labelled
Electrical Isolator, Decktite and Conduit - all sealed with silicon
Handover - Work completed as per specification, checked and accepted
Area ready and accessible for work - take picture of all
Wall mounts adequate for control panel
Cabling concealed and supported in wall
